languages.text: "Ваши требования возмутительны, однако сложно спорить об их беспочвенности. Мы принимаем ваши условия, но более не считаем предложенный ранее пакт о дружбе действительным".

traits.locale_text: "Ваши требования возмутительны, однако сложно спорить об их беспочвенности. Мы принимаем ваши условия, однако более не считаем предложенный ранее пакт о дружбе действительным".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Your demands are outrageous, but we cannot claim they are ill-founded. We accept your terms, but the treaty of friendship we previously offered is hereby withdrawn."
languages.original_text: "Ваши требования возмутительны, однако сложно спорить об их беспочвенности. Мы принимаем ваши условия, но более не считаем предложенный ранее пакт о дружбе действительным".

traits.locale_text: "Your demands are outrageous, but it is difficult to call them ill-founded. We accept your terms, but withdraw the treaty of friendship we offered earlier."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Your demands are outrageous, but it is difficult to call them ill-founded. We accept your terms, but withdraw the treaty of friendship we offered earlier."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Your demands are outrageous, but we cannot claim they are ill-founded. We accept your terms, but the treaty of friendship we previously offered is hereby withdrawn."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Your demands are outrageous, but we cannot claim they are ill-founded. We accept your terms, but the treaty of friendship we previously offered is hereby withdrawn."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Your demands are outrageous, but we cannot claim they are ill-founded. We accept your terms, but the treaty of friendship we previously offered is hereby withdrawn."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “您的要求非常令人震怒，但我们并不认为这个要求毫无根据。我们愿意接受您的条件，但我们要在此撤回之前提出的友好条约。”
languages.original_text: "Your demands are outrageous, but we cannot claim they are ill-founded. We accept your terms, but the treaty of friendship we previously offered is hereby withdrawn."

traits.locale_text: “您的要求非常令人震怒，但我们并不认为这个要求毫无根据。我们愿意接受您的条件，但我们要在此撤回之前提出的友好条约。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Sus exigencias son un ultraje, pero no podemos negar que están fundadas. Aceptamos sus términos, pero retractamos el ofrecimiento anterior de un tratado de amistad».
languages.original_text: "Your demands are outrageous, but we cannot claim they are ill-founded. We accept your terms, but the treaty of friendship we previously offered is hereby withdrawn."

traits.locale_text: «Sus exigencias son un ultraje, pero no podemos negar que están fundadas. Aceptamos sus términos, pero retractamos el ofrecimiento anterior de un tratado de amistad».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「あなた方の要求は非道だが、根拠がないとは言い切れない。我々はあなた方の条件を受け入れるが、以前に提示した友好条約はここに撤回させてもらおう」
languages.original_text: "Your demands are outrageous, but we cannot claim they are ill-founded. We accept your terms, but the treaty of friendship we previously offered is hereby withdrawn."

traits.locale_text: 「あなた方の要求は非道だが、根拠がないとは言い切れない。我々はあなた方の条件を受け入れるが、以前に提示した友好条約はここに撤回させてもらおう」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Eure Forderungen sind unerhört, aber wir können sie nicht als unbegründet zurückweisen. Wir akzeptieren Eure Bedingungen, aber der zuvor angebotene Freundschaftsvertrag ist hiermit hinfällig."
languages.original_text: "Your demands are outrageous, but we cannot claim they are ill-founded. We accept your terms, but the treaty of friendship we previously offered is hereby withdrawn."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Forderungen sind unerhört, aber wir können sie nicht als unbegründet zurückweisen. Wir akzeptieren Eure Bedingungen, aber der zuvor angebotene Freundschaftsvertrag ist hiermit hinfällig."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Cette décision est tout bonnement scandaleuse, mais elle n'est pas sans fondement. Nous acceptons vos exigences. En revanche, nous retirons notre offre d'alliance précédemment énoncée. »
languages.original_text: "Your demands are outrageous, but we cannot claim they are ill-founded. We accept your terms, but the treaty of friendship we previously offered is hereby withdrawn."

traits.locale_text: « Cette décision est tout bonnement scandaleuse, mais elle n'est pas sans fondement. Nous acceptons vos exigences. En revanche, nous retirons notre offre d'alliance précédemment énoncée. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Talepleriniz fazla olmakla birlikte gerçek dışı olduklarını iddia edemeyiz. Şartlarınızı kabul ediyoruz ancak daha önceki dostluk anlaşması teklifimiz an itibarıyla geri çekilmiştir."
languages.original_text: "Your demands are outrageous, but we cannot claim they are ill-founded. We accept your terms, but the treaty of friendship we previously offered is hereby withdrawn."

traits.locale_text: "Talepleriniz makul sınırların ötesinde ancak gerçek dışı olduklarını iddia edemeyiz. Şartlarınızı kabul ediyoruz ancak daha önceki dostluk anlaşması teklifimiz an itibarıyla geri çekilmiştir."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
